briefTitle: Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of the Topical Product in Patients With Mild to Severe Scalp Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site, Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of DSXS 1535 in Patients With Mild to Severe Scalp Psoriasis
summary: A Randomized Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel Design, Multiple-Site, Phase III Clinical Study

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinical Success in Patients With Moderate and Severe Scalp Psoriasis
